throws.description: Whether to throw an error if a node fails.

edges.description: The collection of all edges in the graph.

nodes.description: The collection of all nodes in the graph.

kits.description: All the kits (collections of node handlers) that are used by the graph.

graphs.description: Sub-graphs that are also described by this graph representation.

args.description: Arguments that are passed to the graph, useful to bind values to lambdas.

url.description: The URL pointing to the location of the graph. This URL is used to resolve relative paths in the graph. If not specified, the paths are assumed to be relative to the current working directory.

version.description: Version of the graph. [semver](https://semver.org/) format is encouraged.

propertyNames.description: Unique identifier of a node's input.

NodeIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of a node in a graph.

from.description: The node that the edge is coming from.

to.description: The node that the edge is going to.

in.description: The input of the `to` node. If this value is undefined, then the then no data is passed as output of the `from` node.

out.description: The output of the `from` node. If this value is "*", then all outputs of the `from` node are passed to the `to` node. If this value is undefined, then no data is passed to any inputs of the `to` node.

optional.description: If true, this edge is optional: the data that passes through it is not considered a required input to the node.

constant.description: If true, this edge acts as a constant: the data that passes through it remains available even after the node has consumed it.

Edge.description: Represents an edge in a graph.

InputIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of a node's input.

OutputIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of a node's output.

id.description: Unique id of the node in graph.

type.description: Type of the node. Used to look up the handler for the node.

NodeDescriptor.description: Represents a node in a graph.

NodeTypeIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of a node's type.

NodeConfiguration.description: Values that are supplied as part of the graph. These values are merged with the `InputValues` and supplied as inputs to the `NodeHandler`.

NodeValue.description: A type representing a valid JSON value.

version.description: Version of the kit. [semver](https://semver.org/) format is encouraged.

url.description: The URL pointing to the location of the kit.

SubGraphs.description: Represents a collection of sub-graphs. The key is the identifier of the sub-graph. The value is the descriptor of the sub-graph.

InputValues.description: Values that are supplied as inputs to the `NodeHandler`.

propertyNames.description: Unique identifier of a node's input.
